```bash
(base) phunc20@durian:~$ cat /etc/X11/default-display-manager
/usr/sbin/lightdm
(base) phunc20@durian:~$ echo $XDG_CURRENT_DESKTOP
GNOME
(base) phunc20@durian:~$ echo $XDG_SESSION_TYPE
x11
(base) phunc20@durian:~$ echo $XDG_SESSION_DESKTOP
lightdm-xsession
(base) phunc20@durian:~$ echo $XDG_SESSION_CLASS
user
(base) phunc20@durian:~$ echo $XDG_SESSION_PATH
/org/freedesktop/DisplayManager/Session0
```
